body:
Hi list,


I've created a cron job which pulls the daily CVS HEAD into upstream-cvs
branch in the git repository at
http://git.recluse.de/debian/pkg-radiance.git/
(pull from git://git.recluse.de/debian/pkg-radiance.git please)


In case you're wondering what all the branches are for:
- upstream-cvs: daily cvs head, downloaded and commited at 0730 my time
- upstream: Unmodified sources from Greg of the package I'm working on at the
moment.
- upstream-debian: Modified sources for Debian - please note that I only drop
files here, like the libtiff source or cruft from OSX editors.
- master: place where the packaging happens


Branches are listed in the order I merge Greg's changes. Debian's orig.tar.gz
is built from the upstream-debian branch.




Cheers,


Bernd




P.S. Git rocks!




 Bernd Zeimetz                           Debian GNU/Linux Developer
 GPG Fingerprint: 06C8 C9A2 EAAD E37E 5B2C BE93 067A AD04 C93B FF79
___
